numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that basketball has more players of color than baseball.
2. I notice that football has more players of color than soccer.
3. I notice that Major League Soccer has more head coaches of color than some other sports leagues.
4. Major League Soccer has the lowest percentage of players of color.
5. I wonder why these trends exist across sports and race.
6. I wonder whether a cultural aspect exists.
7. A cultural aspect may make more people of color inclined to play basketball.
8. A cultural aspect may make more people of color inclined to play football.
9. There are fewer people of color who play soccer.
10. I wonder whether people of color feel unwelcomed in soccer.
11. I wonder whether soccer is a predominantly white sport.
12. This trend has an impact on my community.
13. This trend helps me understand why I see this trend in my community.
14. My community is a predominantly people-of-color community.
15. In my community, more people are interested in football than in soccer.
16. In my community, more people are interested in basketball than in soccer.
17. Many people in my community were exposed to football at a young age.
18. Many people in my community were exposed to basketball at a young age.
19. The possible headline is: Is sport leadership aligned with the players' race?
